EDUCATION AND GOVERNMENT  
ABSU  
 IMSU         
  
   (xii) UNIOSUN accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes including 
Government and one (1) other Social Sciences or Arts 
subject, or NCE credit in relevant subjects.  
(xiii) NDU – Same as Vocational and Technical Education.  
(xiv) AAUA accepts   
(a) two  (2)  ‘A’  level  passes 
 chosen  from  
Government/History Economics or Geography.  
(b) NCE merit in Government/History, Economics or 
Geography.  
(c) ND credit inPublic Administration.  
  
  
  
UTME  
(i) OOU accepts TC II merit/credit in English Language, 
Mathematics and three (3) other subjects.  
(ii) UYO, IMSU, CALABAR, EDALV, UNN, PHC and ABUJA 
require 'O' levelpass in Mathematics  
(iii) OAU requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes which must 
include Government, English Language and  
Mathematics or five (5) TC II credit/merit which must 
include English Language, Mathematics History and 
Social Studies.  
    (iv)  IAUED, UNIOSUN and CALABAR do not accept History 
in lieu of Government.  
    (v)  BENIN, DELSU, OOU and LASU require 'O' level credit 
pass in Mathematics. BENIN requires any Social 
Sciences subject.  
    (vi)  PHC requires one (1) of Economics, Commerce or 
Geography/Physics.  
    (v)  BIU, DELSU and LASU requires 'O' levelcredit pass in 
Mathematics.  
    (vi)  ABSU requires five (5) 'O' levelcredit passes to include 
English Language, Government or History and any 
three (3) subjects, and  'O' levelpass in Mathematics.
